description.lang: This is our fastest and most affordable series controller! The unit is designed to control light switches, thermostats, door locks, audio / video equipment, cameras, garage doors, water valves, energy monitors and much more.Home owners can access at home or via the cloud with just about any smartphone, tablet or table-top touchscreen. Your intelligence stays at home, ensuring better security and reliability.
Group 1 for Lifeline, when reset gateway, it will send device reset locally notification to Associate nodes, if no node in group, it will send broadcast reset locally notification
